vista.gui
Interface Command

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddNewGroupCommand, AddReferenceCloneCommand, AddReferenceCommand, CloneGroupCommand, CreateTWReferencesCommand, DeleteReferencesCommand, ExportDataCommand, ExportDataToDSSCommand, GraphDataCommand, GraphDataCommand2, GroupPathnameFilterCommand, InsertReferenceAtCommand, MacroCommand, MonthlyAverageCommand, MoveGroupCommand, MoveReferenceCommand, OpenConnectionSessionCommand, OpenDSSFileCommand, OpenGroupAsTreeCommand, OpenGroupCommand, OpenHydroTideFileCommand, OpenSessionCommand, RemoveGroupCommand, SaveSessionCommand, ScatterGraphCommand, SetNewSessionCommand, SetSessionNameCommand, SortReferencesCommand, SortSessionCommand, TabulateDataCommand, UnionGroupCommand, UpdateDataCommand
public interface Command

The command interface for uniformizing access to application functionality. This can be thought of as the common meeting ground for both script and gui access to application functionality.

Version:
$Id: Command.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:13 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu

Method Summary
 void execute()
          executes command
 boolean isUnexecutable()
          checks if command is executable.
 void unexecute()
          unexecutes command or throws exception if not unexecutable
